info.author: Matteo Merli
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description:
This is a quick-and-dirty Apache log analizer wich provides a report
  on the latest visits to a certain web site.
  This report includes all the information about the accesses.
  
  * It can fetch your log file from a remote server using http and ftp, 
    or accessing it from local file system.
  
  * It tries to "reverse DNS" to obtain the host name from visitors IPs.
  
  * If GeoIP database with python interface is installed, it will be
    used to obtain the contry from IP addresses.
    See: http://www.maxmind.com/
info.name: LatestVisitors
info.html_description:
This is a quick-and-dirty Apache log analizer wich provides a report

on the latest visits to a certain web site. This report includes all the information about the accesses.

  • It can fetch your log file from a remote server using http and ftp, or accessing it from local file system.
  • It tries to “reverse DNS” to obtain the host name from visitors IPs.
  • If GeoIP database with python interface is installed, it will be used to obtain the contry from IP addresses. See: http://www.maxmind.com/
